api_name: Razorpay APIs: Create an Order

Create an order using this API. Amount and currency are mandatory parameters.

Know more about the <a href="https://razorpay.com/docs/api/orders/#create-an-order" target="_blank">Create an Order

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Create an Invoice with Customer Id
functionality:
Create an Invoice using the Create an Invoice API.

Some points to note. You can:
- Create a blank invoice (with no

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Create an Invoice with Customer Details

body.raw:
{
  "type": "invoice",
  "description": "Invoice for the month of January 2020",
  "partial_payment": true,
  "customer": {
    "name": "Gaurav Kumar",
    "contact": 9000090000,
    "email": "gaurav.kumar@example.com",
    "billing_address": {
      "line1": "Ground & 1st Floor, SJR Cyber Laskar",
      "line2": "Hosur Road",
      "zipcode": "560068",
      "city": "Bengaluru",
      "state": "Karnataka",
      "country": "in"
    },
    "shipping_address": {
      "line1": "Ground & 1st Floor, SJR Cyber Laskar",
      "line2": "Hosur Road",
      "zipcode": "560068",
      "city": "Bengaluru",
      "state": "Karnataka",
      "country": "in"
    }
  },
  "line_items": [
    {
      "name": "Master Cloud Computing in 30 Days",
      "description": "Book by Ravena Ravenclaw",
      "amount": 399,
      "currency": "USD",
      "quantity": 1
    }
  ],
  "sms_notify": 1,
  "email_notify": 1,
  "currency": "USD",
  "expire_by": 1589765167
}

functionality: NO DESC IN POSTMAN

{
  "account_number": "7878780080316316",
  "fund_account_id": "fa_00000000000001",
  "amount": 1000000,
  "currency": "INR",
  "mode": "IMPS",

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Fetch an Account
functionality:
Use this API to fetch the details of an account.

Know more about the [Fetch an Account API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/account-onboarding/#fetch-an-account).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Update an Account
functionality:
Use this API to update the details of an account.

Know more about the [Update an Account](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/account-onboarding/#update-an-account) API.

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Delete an Account
functionality:
Use this API to delete an account.

Know more about the [Delete an Account API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/account-onboarding/#delete-an-account).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Create a Stakeholder
functionality:
Use this API to create a stakeholder.

Know more about the [Create a Stakeholder API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/stakeholder/#create-a-stakeholder).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Fetch a Stakeholder
functionality:
Use this API to fetch a stakeholder.

Know more about the [Fetch a Stakeholder API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/stakeholder/#fetch-a-stakeholder).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Fetch all Stakeholders

Know more about the [Fetch all Stakeholders API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/stakeholder/#fetch-all-stakeholders).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Update a Stakeholder
functionality:

Know more about the [Update a Stakeholder API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/stakeholder/#update-a-stakeholder).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Upload Stakeholder Documents
functionality:
Use the API to upload signatory documents for a stakeholder.

Know more about the [Upload Stakeholder Documents API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/upload-document/#upload-stakeholder-documents).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Upload Account Documents
functionality:
Use the API to upload business documents for a sub-merchant's account.

Know more about the [Upload Account Documents API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/upload-document/#upload-account-documents).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Fetch Account Documents
functionality:
Use the API to fetch business documents for a sub-merchant's account.

Know more about the [Fetch Account Documents API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/upload-document/#fetch-account-documents).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Fetch Stakeholders Documents
functionality:
Use the API to fetch the files uploaded for a stakeholder.

Know more about the [Fetch Stakeholders Documents API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/partners/upload-document/#fetch-stakeholder-documents).

api_name: Razorpay APIs: Fetch Payments for a QR Code
functionality: You can fetch payments for a specific QR Code using this [API](https://razorpay.com/docs/api/qr-codes#fetch-payments-for-a-qr-code).
